data.message: I love your music but god dam dude dont you think you have enough fucking money now your selling bricks from your childhood home dude that is some fucked up shit. People are homeless in this state and your selling fucking bricks wow what a fucking greedy bastard you are Marshall.

replies.message: This is the shit that makes me want to stop listening to rap and go back to metal music at least those dudes dont flash shit around like they own the world.
